body_html:
The solution from @frankchn resolved the initial issue, however, there is another one followed.

I checked and I am sure that libcudnn.so.7 is in LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

body:
The solution from @frankchn resolved the initial issue, however, there is another one followed.

I checked and I am sure that libcudnn.so.7 is in LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
